highlights: Designed and optimized a PostgreSQL database and backend using Python/Django, enabling health outcome tracking for over 20,000 conditions.
Improved database infrastructure and backend queries, slashing average query delay to < 2ms (10x improvement), demonstrating a focus on performance.
Contributed to a pilot LLM chatbot project, gaining experience with Python-based services.
Developed a traditional ML model that automatically triaged 15,000 patients and reduced health screening meetings by ~70%.
Key contributor to a CNN compilation toolchain (Python), demonstrating experience with complex, high-performance Python codebases.
Developed a multi-threaded process that increased network compilation by ~40% and sped up basic processes by ~20x.
Maintained automated systems on a Jenkins server, providing experience with CI/CD and build systems.
Automated release procedure using Bash, speeding up the process by 10x and gaining experience with tooling.
Optimized proxy iterations for web crawling, increasing speed by 20x.
Delivered 20+ crucial business datasets via optimized SQL queries, supporting key company decisions.
Developed a Chrome extension using TypeScript to analyze job descriptions and tailor resumes.
Utilized Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to provide a quick fit analysis and draft cover letters.
projects.name: AI job search helper (Chrome Extension)

summary: Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in building and optimizing scalable backend systems and open-source tooling. Proven track record of improving performance and efficiency, with a passion for writing well-designed, tested, and maintainable code.
